text: The rufous-crested coquette (Lophornis delattrei) is a species of hummingbird. It is found in Bolivia, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Panama, and Peru. It lives in subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests, subtropical or tropical moist montane forests, and heavily degraded former forest. Category:Birds of Central America Category:Birds of South America Category:Hummingbirds
title: Rufous-crested coquette
